#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(juk_fly)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")

add_executable(juk_fly juk_fly.cpp server.h)

find_package(roscpp REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(juk_fly PUBLIC ${roscpp_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(GeoMath REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(juk_fly PUBLIC ${GeoMath_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(sensor_msgs REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(juk_fly PUBLIC ${sensor_msgs_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_package(juk_msg REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(juk_fly PUBLIC ${juk_msg_INCLUDE_DIRS})

find_library(PTHREAD_LIBRARY pthread)
 
target_link_libraries(juk_fly  /usr/local/lib/libGeoMath_lib.a ${PTHREAD_LIBRARY} ${roscpp_LIBRARIES} "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")

install(TARGETS juk_fly DESTINATION bin)
